general.derivativeLayerNotice: The following layers and tables are included in the view layer. Because this view has dependent layers, changes cannot be made to the layer and table visibility or to the view definitions.
general.selectLayerPanelDescription: The layers you select here will be included in the view layer.
general.selectLayerPanelReplicaNotice: Swap source cannot be performed when sync is enabled and there are outstanding replicas.
general.includedLayerPanelDescription: Define filters and fields for individual layers.

defineView.addDefinitionsMsg: Create a filtered view of your layer using attributes, by drawing a shape, or by using a shape from another layer.
defineView.aoiPolygonDraw: Draw an area on the map.
defineView.aoiRectangleDraw: Click and drag to draw a rectangle.

createView.info: Add information for your new view layer.
createView.title: Title

swapSource.title: Swapping source
swapSource.subTitle: Select source layer
swapSource.msg1: Change the source layer of the view to reference another feature layer. View configurations are retained after changing the source layer.
swapSource.msg3: If you need to revert your view layer, you can change the source layer back to the previous source layer.
swapSource.requirement1: Includes the same layers and tables as the original source layer.
swapSource.requirement2: The layer and table order and IDs, spatial reference, and geometry types must match the original source layer.
swapSource.requirement3: The new source layer fields match the visible fields of the view layer.
swapSource.derivativeMsg: Warning: This view layer has dependent tile layers, vector tile layers, and/or scene layers. The dependent layers will show outdated data until the cache is rebuilt.

tips.includedLayerPanelTipDescription: Adjust the definition of your layer to include only the features you need.

msg.initFailed: Could not access layer. Try again.
msg.atLeastOne: At least one layer must be selected.
msg.createFailed: The view layer could not be created. Try again.
msg.updateFailed: The view layer could not be updated. Try again.
msg.successSwap: View layer has been updated to use ${source} as its source.
msg.swapFailed: The source could not be swapped. Try again.

swapErrors.layerType: The layer type does not match.
swapErrors.layerCount: The number of layers does not match.
swapErrors.geometryType: A layer geometry type does not match.
swapErrors.spatialReference: The spatial reference does not match.
swapErrors.missingField: Visible fields on the view layer are missing on the selected layer.

join.selectTargetLayerPanelDescription: Select the layer or table that will have attributes from the join layer added to its attribute table.
join.selectAddLayerPanelDescription: Select the layer or table with the attributes that will be added to the target layer.
join.attributeJoinMsg: Specify the fields to join on.
join.joinSettingsMsg: Specify which records will be returned.
join.joinOperationInfoMsg: Specify how joins will be handled if multiple records from the join layer meet the join criteria. Choose from the following options:
join.joinOperationInfoOneToOne: — Join a single record in the join layer to each feature in the target layer.
join.joinOperationInfoOneToMany: — Join all the matching features in the join layer to the target layer. The result layer will contain multiple records of the target feature.
join.onlyFirst: Only keep the first matching record
join.joinTypeMsg: Determines whether unmatched target features will be included in the output. An ${innerJoin} returns only matched target records, whereas a ${leftJoin} returns all target records, even if the target feature does not have a match in the join layer.
join.obacMsg: The target and join layers have Ownership-Based Access Control (OBAC) enabled. The joined view layer will honor OBAC from the target layer.
join.obacNotSupportedMsg: Joined view layers can't be created from layers with Ownership-Based Access Control enabled. Please select a different layer to continue.
